    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99461</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical reaction of zinc with hydrochloric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemische Reaktion des Zinks mit Salzsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction chimique de zinc avec de l'acide 
chlorhydrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação química do zinco com ácido 
hydrochloric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione chimica di zinco con acido cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημική αντίδραση του ψευδάργυρου με το υδροχλωρικό 
οξύ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción química del cinc con el ácido 
hidroclórico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experiment carried out to investigate what the final product is when all the water in the solution, which resulted from the reaction of zinc with hydrochloric acid, is evaporated.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction products</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reactive metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salt solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">substances</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zinc chloride</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Experiment, das 
durchgeführt wird, um nachzuforschen, was das abschließende Produkt 
ist, wenn das ganzes Wasser in der Lösung, die aus der Reaktion des 
Zinks mit Salzsäure resultierte, verdunstet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une expérience 
effectuée pour étudier ce que le produit final est quand toute l'eau
dans la solution, qui a résulté de la réaction du zinc avec de 
l'acide chlorhydrique, est évaporée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma experiência 
realizada para investigar o que o produto final é quando toda a água
na solução, que resultou da reação do zinco com ácido 
hydrochloric, é evaporada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un esperimento 
effettuato per studiare che cosa il prodotto finale è quando tutta 
l'acqua nella soluzione, che è derivato dalla reazione di zinco con 
acido cloridrico, è evaporata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα που 
πραγματοποιείται για να ερευνήσει τι το τελικό προϊόν είναι 
πότε όλο το ύδωρ στη λύση, που προέκυψε από την αντίδραση του 
ψευδάργυρου με το υδροχλωρικό οξύ, εξατμίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un experimento realizado
para investigar cuál es el producto final cuando toda la agua en la 
solución, que resultó de la reacción del cinc con el ácido 
hidroclórico, se evapora.</string>
          </description>
